Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS
REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Relates to exempting the metropolitan transportation authority from bond issuance charges
Summary: Exempts the metropolitan transportation authority from bond issuance charges otherwise required to be paid to the state.
LawCode: Amd ยง2976, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to exempting certain public authorities from bond issuance charges
